sections.instructions: Provide needs overview for girls and boys, including adolescents, across pre-primary, primary, and secondary; include gender, disability inclusion, and MHPSS considerations. Highlight data sources/gaps, disaggregate by sex/age/disability, and reference EiE WG/hrp context.

Describe programme results aligned with the Collective Results Framework: outcomes & outputs across pre-primary (target 10%), primary, secondary (target 20%) and teachers; gender-responsive approach (60% girls target), disability inclusion (10% of children with disabilities), MHPSS integration, INEE Minimum Standards (access, quality, capacity development), coordination & referrals (CP, GBV, gender, PSEA, disability), and AAP.

sections.section_label: 3. Gender, Disability Inclusion & Intersecting Inequalities Approach
sections.instructions: Summarize overall gender and disability inclusion approach, intersecting inequalities (IDPs, refugees, ethnic minorities, adolescent girls). Include GBV prevention/mitigation/response with at least one GBV risk mitigation indicator and budget line; note IASC GAM application and reference number; engagement of women-led and DPOs; address data gaps.
Explain the education coordination mechanism, leads/co-leads, participation, LEG involvement, and coordination with other clusters/sectors (CP, GBV, Health, WASH).

Describe proposal development process: notification dates, meetings, decisions, inclusion of government, LEG, donors; engagement of local groups (parents/caregivers, women-led orgs, disability orgs) and MHPSS stakeholders.

Outline inclusive, transparent, conflict-of-interest-avoiding process: timeline, independent selection committee composition, criteria, solicitation, communication of decisions and adjudication of challenges. Attach minutes/emails as supporting documentation. Include link to grantee confirmation form (post-selection).

Explain joint monitoring of outcomes/outputs: data collection, aggregation/analysis, storage; monitoring frequency; tools; responsible org per indicator; engagement of local/national orgs with expertise in gender, disability, MHPSS. Specify Lead Grantee.
